thread.title: You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services
thread.title_full: You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services

title: You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services
text:
You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services Civitan Services in Benton is hosting a murder mystery dinner, and they're hoping to draw big crowds. Post to Facebook You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services Civitan Services in Benton is hosting a murder mystery dinner, and they're hoping to draw big crowds.  //on.kthv.com/1LdGGYu   Join the Conversation To   You’re invited to a murder mystery dinner with Civitan Services THV 11 Staff, news source 8:01 a.m. CDT October 5, 2015 A masquerade mask and a blue feather boa. (Photo: Bryant Animal Control) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BENTON, Ark. (KTHV) - Civitan Services in Benton is hosting a murder mystery dinner, and they're hoping to draw big crowds. 
If you like the idea of a masquerade themed murder mystery, the event happens Thurs., Oct. 29 at 6 p.m. at the Benton Event Center. 
Civitan Services describes the dinner as a whodunit mystery put on by the Royal Players. It’s up to guests to discover the crime. 
For contact information, tickets, and dress details, go to CivitanServices.com: http://on.kthv.com/1JOnmMb
